Anthony Borges was the last Parkland survivor to leave the hospital after being shot while barricading a door to a classroom to protect other students. He was only 15. A powerful cover story from @NYMag. 
http://nymag.com/intelligencer/2018/10/school-shooting-survivors.html

RT @SenMarkey It is simply unnacceptable that @ColumbiaGasMA will miss its self-imposed Nov 19 deadline. It needs to do everything possible to make sure homes impacted by the #MVexplosions are repaired in time for winter weather. Families cannot wait for another excuse. http://www.bostonherald.com/business/business_markets/2018/10/columbia_gas_blasted_for_blown_deadline

When we stand together and demand that this country works for all of us rather than just the few, we can transform America. Let’s do everything we can these next 7 days to make that happen.

Right now, a Texas judge is considering a lawsuit that will decimate protections for people with pre-existing conditions. GOP officials across the country have defended this effort to strip away care from vulnerable Americans. This is the GOP position on health care.

MUST WATCH 📽️: If the current occupant of the White House and Republicans have it their way, the protections for our pre-existing conditions would be gone. Just another reason why we need to win. #ProtectOurCare http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1057294216483741696/pu/img/3fItYLaLlUVcqpu_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1057294216483741696/pu/vid/320x180/5q6qADaFEAsaftqr.mp4?tag=5

One week from today Americans across the country will head to the polls. Now's a good time to make a plan to vote: 
1. Find out where you’re going to vote. 
2. Figure out how you’re getting to your polling place. 
3. Determine a time to head to the polls. 
4. Spread the word.
